<!DOCTYPE html>
<html prefix="og: http://opengraphprotocol.org/schema/ fb: http://www.facebook.com/2010/fbml d: http://dictionary.com/2011/dml" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head>
        <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-type"/>
        <base href="http://www.dictionary.com/"/>
        <title>Sheep | Define Sheep at Dictionary.com</title>
        <script type="text/javascript">
    var cookiesManager = function (){
        'use strict';

        var persistentValues = [];

        return {
            getCookieValue : function(name) {
                var value = null,
                    cookies = document.cookie,
                    searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");

                // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie
                if (searchedCookie === -1) {
                    var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");
                    searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie == 0 ? 0 : -1;
                }

                if (searchedCookie > -1) {
                    var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,
                        endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);

                    if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {
                        endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;
                    }

                    value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);
                }

                return value;
            },

            setCookie: function(name, value, hours, domain) {
                var expires = '',
                    domain  = domain || UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain();

                if(hours !== undefined) {
                    var now     = new Date(),
                        time    = now.getTime();

                    time += (3600 * hours) * 1000;
                    now.setTime(time);

                    expires = ';expires=' + now.toGMTString();
                }

                document.cookie =
                    name + '=' + value +
                        expires +
                        ';path=/' +
                        ';domain=' + domain;
            },

            /*
            * This method ensures, that everywhere on the page value of cookie will be the same.
            * It's important in case of cookie, which value can change across the page.
            */
            getPersistentCookieValue: function(name) {
                if (typeof persistentValues[name] === 'undefined') {
                    persistentValues[name] = this.getCookieValue(name);
                    // after reading value, cookie has to be removed
                    this.setCookie(name, null, -1);
                }

                return persistentValues[name];
            }
        }
    }();
</script><script type="text/javascript">
    /*jslint browser: true */

    var UrlHelper = function() {
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS     = '.thesaurus.com';
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY    = '.dictionary.com';
        var COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE     = '.reference.com';

        var domain = null;
        var currentURL = null;
        var spanidsUrl = null;

        function getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, currentDomain) {
            var url     = 'http://';
            var source  = '';

            if(currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) {
                url += 'spanids.reference.com/?';
                source = 'd';
            } else if (currentDomain == COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE){
                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';
                source = 'r';
            } else {
                url += 'spanids.dictionary.com/?';
                source = 't';
            }

            url += 'bid=' + bid + '&asid=' + sid + '&bidnew=1&asidnew=1&source=' + source + '&site=app';


            return url;
        }

        function getCurrentDomain() {
            var host = window.location.host;
            var value = "";
            if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS) > -1) {
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_THESAURUS;
            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY) > -1) {
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_DICTIONARY;
            } else if(host.indexOf(COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE) > -1){
                value = COOKIE_DOMAIN_REFERENCE;
            }

            return value;
        }

        return {
            getCurrentDomain : function() {
                if(domain === null) {
                    domain = getCurrentDomain();
                }
                return domain;
            },

            getCurrentDomainFromRequest : function() {
                return window.location.host;
            },

            getCurrentUrl : function() {
                if(currentURL === null) {
                    currentURL = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + "" + window.location.pathname;
                }
                return currentURL;
            },

            getSpanidsUrl : function(bid, sid, domain) {
                if(spanidsUrl === null) {
                    spanidsUrl = getSpanidsUrl(bid, sid, domain);
                }

                return spanidsUrl;
            }
        }
    }();
</script><script type="text/javascript">
    var BidSidGenerator = (function () {
        'use strict';
        var COOKIE_NAME_BID = 'bid',
            COOKIE_NAME_SID = 'sid',
            COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS = 'spanids',
            COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES = 17520, //two years
            COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES = 0.5, //half an hour
            bidCookieValue = null,
            sidCookieValue = null,
            bidCookieCreated = false,
            sidCookieCreated = false,
            spanIdsCookiePresent = false;

        // generates value of bid/sid cookie
        function generateCookieValue() {
            var max = 999999,
                min = 100000,
                rand = Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min,
                time = new Date().getTime();

            return rand + "-" + time;
        }

        // sets value of spanIdsCookiePresent attribute to true and delete spanids cookie,
        // if cookie exist and have appropriate value
        function processSpanIdsCookie() {
            var spanIdsValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS);

            if(spanIdsValue === '1') {
                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SPANIDS, 0, -1); //removes spanids cookie
                spanIdsCookiePresent = true;
            }

            return false;
        }

        return {
            init: function () {
                bidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_BID);
                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);

                if (bidCookieValue == null || bidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    bidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_BID, bidCookieValue, COOKIE_BID_EXPIRES);
                    bidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    sidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                processSpanIdsCookie();
                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);
            },
            propagateCookies: function() {
                if (bidCookieCreated || sidCookieCreated || spanIdsCookiePresent) {
                    var url = UrlHelper.getSpanidsUrl(bidCookieValue, sidCookieValue, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomain()),
                        iFrame = '<iframe id="spanids" style="width:1px;height:1px;margin-left:-1;position:absolute;border:none;" src="' + url + '"></iframe>';
                    document.write(iFrame);
                }
            },
            touchSidCookie: function () {
                sidCookieValue  = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SID);
                if (sidCookieValue == null || sidCookieValue.length == 0) {
                    sidCookieValue = generateCookieValue();
                    sidCookieCreated = true;
                }

                cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SID, sidCookieValue, COOKIE_SID_EXPIRES);
            },
            isSidCookieCreated: function () {
                return sidCookieCreated;
            },
            isSpanIdsCookiePresent: function () {
                return spanIdsCookiePresent;
            }
        };
    }());

    BidSidGenerator.init();
    BidSidGenerator.propagateCookies();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    /*
    This partial is used only on DCOM SERP. It's responsible for read "searchOrgQuery" cookie, which is set during redirection
    for Index Divorce project and only then. After read this cookie, cookie is deleted, but value is still accessible via SOQR api.
     */
    var DARCI = DARCI || {};

    DARCI.OQR = (function(){
        'use strict';

        var COOKIE_NAME = 'OriginalQuery',
            value = -1;

        function setValue() {
            value = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME);

            if (value !== null) {
                value = decodeURIComponent(value);
            }
        }

        function deleteCookie() {
            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME, null, -1);
        }

        function init() {
            setValue();
            deleteCookie();
        }

        return {
            getValue: function() {
                if (value === -1) {
                    init();
                }

                return value;
            }
        }
    })();
</script><script>
    var DARCI = DARCI || {},
        u = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=ps&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf_qr=%25%25REFQUERY%25%25&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop",
        s = location.search.match(new RegExp('[\?\&]s=([^\&]*)(\&?)', 'i')),
        ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms,

        /**
         * Because this file is added only in case when CSL is enabled,
         * we can be sure cookieManager will be available.
         */
        refQuery = cookiesManager.getPersistentCookieValue('ReferrerQuery'),
        query, orgQuery;

    DARCI.SearchBoxClickLinkId = '59wn52';

            orgQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
        query =  orgQuery !== null ? orgQuery : "sheep";

        u = u.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);
    

    if (s != null && s[1]) {
        if (s[1] == 't' || s[1] == 'ts' || s[1] == 'tn') {
            var ev = u.indexOf('ev=');
            if (ev !== -1) {
                ev = ev + 3;
                u = u.slice(0, ev) + 'c' + u.slice(ev) + '&cl=59wn52&sc=1';
                u = u.replace('%25%25REFQUERY%25%25', refQuery);
            }
        }
    }

    new Image().src = u + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);
</script>
<link href="//static.sfdict.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//pixel.quantserve.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//partner.googleadservices.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//pubads.g.doubleclick.net" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//pagead2.googlesyndication.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//pr.ybp.yahoo.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//ads.yahoo.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//u.openx.net" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//ib.adnxs.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="//ox-d.bstk.servedbyopenx.com" rel="dns-prefetch"/><link href="https://ad.doubleclick.net" rel="dns-prefetch"/><script>
    /**
     * The module is responsible for setting/incrementing the value of sc cookie which contains "sessionCount,pageviewCount" values.
     *
     * init: sets the cookie with default values or increments; actions performed are based on condition whether the
     *          sid cookie was created or already existed. The default expiration time for sc cookie is 0.5 year
     *
     * global BidSidGenerator
     * global cookiesManager
     * global UrlHelper
     */
    var SCCookie = function () {
        var COOKIE_NAME_SC = "sc",
            DELIMITER = ",",
            sessionCountValue = 0,
            pageviewCountValue  = 0,
            cookieExpiration  = 180 * 24; // half a year

        /**
         * Reads "sc" cookie and parses the value into appropriate variables.
         * @returns {boolean} Was the cookie present?
         */
        function readCookie()
        {
            var cookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SC),
                cookieValuesArray,
                cookieSessionCountValue,
                cookiePageviewCountValue;

            if (cookieValue == null) {
                return false;
            }

            cookieValuesArray = cookieValue.split(DELIMITER);
            cookieSessionCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[0], 10);
            cookiePageviewCountValue = parseInt(cookieValuesArray[1], 10);

            if (cookieSessionCountValue > 0) {
                sessionCountValue = cookieSessionCountValue;
            }

            if (cookiePageviewCountValue > 0) {
                pageviewCountValue = cookiePageviewCountValue;
            }

            return true;
        }

        /**
         * Writes current variable values into the "sc" cookie.
         */
        function writeCookie()
        {
            cookiesManager.setCookie(COOKIE_NAME_SC, sessionCountValue + DELIMITER + pageviewCountValue, cookieExpiration, UrlHelper.getCurrentDomainFromRequest());
        }

        return {
            init: function () {
                if (typeof BidSidGenerator !== 'undefined') {
                    var cookiePresent = readCookie();

                    if (!cookiePresent) {
                        sessionCountValue = 1;
                        pageviewCountValue = 1;
                    } else {
                        if (BidSidGenerator.isSidCookieCreated() || BidSidGenerator.isSpanIdsCookiePresent()) {
                            pageviewCountValue = 1;
                            sessionCountValue++;
                        } else {
                            pageviewCountValue++;
                        }
                    }

                    writeCookie();
                }
            },

            getPageViewCount: function () {
                return pageviewCountValue;
            },

            getSessionCount: function () {
                return sessionCountValue;
            }
        }

    }();

    SCCookie.init();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var src = null;
                        var retina = window.devicePixelRatio > 1;
            if(retina) {
                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-highdpi-3146e.png';
            } else {
                new Image().src = 'http://www.dictionary.com/drc/img/responsive/serp-lowdpi-6c95e.png';
            }
            </script><meta content="100000304287730;109125464873" property="fb:admins"/><meta content="Dictionary.com" property="og:site_name"/><meta content="http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/img/social_logo-b8e2f.png" property="og:image"/><meta content="127444090629600" property="fb:app_id"/><meta content="DF5542D7723770377E9ABFF59AC1DC97" name="msvalidate.01"/><meta content="no" http-equiv="imagetoolbar"/><meta content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no" name="viewport"/><meta content="sheep, online dictionary, English dictionary, sheep definition, define sheep, definition of sheep,
        sheep pronunciation, sheep meaning, sheep origin, sheep examples" name="keywords"/><meta content="the definition of sheep" property="og:title"/><meta content="Sheep definition, any of numerous ruminant mammals of the genus Ovis, of the family Bovidae, closely related to the goats, especially O. aries, bred in a number of domesticated varieties. See more." name="description"/><meta content="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/sheep" property="og:url"/><link href="http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/favicon.ico" rel="shortcut icon"/><link href="http://www.dictionary.com/opensearch_desc.xml" rel="search" title="Dictionary.com" type="application/opensearchdescription+xml"/><link href="https://plus.google.com/117428481782081853923" rel="publisher"/><link href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/sheep" rel="canonical"/><link href="http://www.dictionary.com/drc/css/combinedSerp-935a5.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">
    var searchURL = "http://www.dictionary.com/browse/%40%40queryText%40%40?s=t";var pageName = "dic";</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var UserController = function() {
        var USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN = 'L';
        var USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED = 'N';

        var USER_UNDER_13 = 'Y';
        var USER_OVER_13 = 'N';

        var COOKIE_NAME_SESS = 'sess';
        var COOKIE_NAME_FAV = 'fav';
        var COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS = 'ss';

        var PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE = 9;
        var FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY = 0;
        var FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY = 1;
        var FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY = 2;

        var isLoggedIn = null;
        var isPremium = null;
        var isSuperSess = null;
        var favNumber = null;
        var isUnder13 = null;
        var displayAds = null;

        /**
         * Checking if user is under 13 using value from fav cookie
         * @returns {boolean}
         */
        function checkIsUserUnder13() {
            if (isLoggedIn !== true) {
                return false;
            }

            var isUnder13 = USER_OVER_13;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                isUnder13 = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_USER_UNDER_13_KEY];
            }

            return isUnder13 === USER_UNDER_13;
        }

        function checkIsUserLoggedIn() {
            var userStatus = USER_STATUS_NOT_LOGGED;
            var sessCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SESS);

            if(sessCookieValue != null) {
                userStatus = sessCookieValue.charAt(0);
            }

            return userStatus === USER_STATUS_LOGGED_IN;
        }

        function checkIfUserIsPremium() {
            var premiumStatus = null;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                premiumStatus = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_PREMIUM_STATUS_KEY];
            }

            return premiumStatus == PREMIUM_STATUS_VALUE;
        }

        function getFavNum() {
            var count = 0;
            var favCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_FAV);

            if(favCookieValue != null) {
                favCookieValue = decodeURIComponent(favCookieValue);
                count = favCookieValue.split('|')[FAV_COOKIE_FAV_COUNT_KEY];
            }

            return count;
        }


        /**
         * Checking super session cookie and calling ajax endpoint if cookie exists
         * @returns {boolean}
         */
        function checkIfUserHasSuperSession() {
            // get ss cookie value
            var superSessionCookieValue = cookiesManager.getCookieValue(COOKIE_NAME_SUPERSESS);

            // if there is ss cookie then make ajax (cors) call to check ss cookie and get response on callback
            if(superSessionCookieValue !== null){

                var xhr = createCORSRequest('GET', 'http://app.dictionary.com/supersession/check/' + superSessionCookieValue);

                if (xhr){
                    // Define a callback function
                    xhr.onload = function(){
                        var responseData = xhr.responseText;
                        var data = JSON.parse(responseData);
                        // process the response.

                        // if response is null then do nothing
                        if(data == null) {
                            // do nothing
                        } else {
                            // otherwise set the session cookie
                            cookiesManager.setCookie("sess", data['sessionCookie']);

                            // change header appropriately
                            changeBodyClassNameForUser();
                        }
                    };

                    // Send request
                    xhr.send();
                }

                return true;
            } else {
                return false;
            }
        }

        /**
         * A method to create cors request
         * @param method
         * @param url
         * @returns {XMLHttpRequest}
         */
        function createCORSRequest(method, url) {
            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
            if ("withCredentials" in xhr) {

                // Check if the XMLHttpRequest object has a "withCredentials" property.
                // "withCredentials" only exists on XMLHTTPRequest2 objects.
                xhr.open(method, url, true);

            } else if (typeof XDomainRequest != "undefined") {

                // Otherwise, check if XDomainRequest.
                // XDomainRequest only exists in IE, and is IE's way of making CORS requests.
                xhr = new XDomainRequest();
                xhr.open(method, url);

            } else {

                // Otherwise, CORS is not supported by the browser.
                xhr = null;

            }

            return xhr;
        }

        /**
         * Checking user status and setting correct body className for user
         */
        function changeBodyClassNameForUser() {
            if(isPremium)
                document.body.className+=' premium';
            if(isLoggedIn)
                document.body.className+=' loggedin';
            if(isUnder13)
                document.body.className+=' isUnder13';
        }

        return {

            initHead: function() {
                isLoggedIn = checkIsUserLoggedIn();
                isPremium = checkIfUserIsPremium();
                isUnder13 = checkIsUserUnder13();
            },

            initBody: function(){
                // on initialization check user status and change append body class name accordingly
                changeBodyClassNameForUser();

                // if the user is not logged in then check to see if the user has an ss cookie
                if(isLoggedIn !== true) {
                    // call function responsible for checking ss cookie and calling ajax endpoint
                    isSuperSess = checkIfUserHasSuperSession();
                }
            },

            isLoggedIn : function() {
                return isLoggedIn;
            },

            isPremium : function() {
                return isPremium
            },

            getFavNumber : function() {
                if(favNumber === null) {
                    favNumber = getFavNum();
                }
                return favNumber;
            },

            isUnder13 : function() {
                return isUnder13;
            },

            shouldDisplayAds: function() {
                if(displayAds === null) {
                    displayAds = !isPremium && !checkIsUserUnder13();
                }
                return displayAds;
            }
        }


    }();
    UserController.initHead();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var _sp_=function(n){function t(e){if(o[e])return o[e].exports;var r=o[e]={i:e,l:!1,exports:{}};return n[e].call(r.exports,r,r.exports,t),r.l=!0,r.exports}var o={};return t.m=n,t.c=o,t.i=function(n){return n},t.d=function(n,o,e){t.o(n,o)||Object.defineProperty(n,o,{configurable:!1,enumerable:!0,get:e})},t.n=function(n){var o=n&&n.__esModule?function(){return n["default"]}:function(){return n};return t.d(o,"a",o),o},t.o=function(n,t){return Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(n,t)},t.p="",t(t.s=2)}([function(n,t,o){function e(n,t){r&&console[n].apply(console,["[bootstrap]"].concat(Array.prototype.slice.call(t)))}var r=(o(0),!1);n.exports={debug:function(){e("debug",arguments)},info:function(){e("info",arguments)},time:function(){e("time",arguments)},warn:function(){e("warn",arguments)},error:function(){e("error",arguments)},useDefaults:function(){r=!0},DEBUG:1}},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(){D||(D=!0,z=h.config=h.config||{},s(),N=z.bootstrap&&z.bootstrap.contentControlCallback||z.content_control_callback,B=z.accountId||z.account_id||z.client_id||window.sp_cid,G=z.beacon&&z.beacon.contentControlEndpoint||z.content_control_beacon_endpoint||v.a,z.debug_level&&"OFF"!==z.debug_level.toString().toUpperCase()||z.debug&&z.debug.level&&"OFF"!==z.debug.level.toString().toUpperCase()?q=!0:window.location.search&&null!=window.location.search.match(/_sp_debug_level=(?!off|OFF)/)&&(q=!0),q&&m.useDefaults({defaultLevel:m.DEBUG}))}function r(n,t,e){function r(o,e){var r=new Image;r.src="//"+G+"/cct?v="+encodeURIComponent(v.b)+"&ct="+_+"&cid="+encodeURIComponent(B)+"&l="+encodeURIComponent(n.toString())+"&rc="+encodeURIComponent(t)+"&d0="+encodeURIComponent(i)+(o?"&d1="+encodeURIComponent(o):"")+(e?"&d2="+encodeURIComponent(e):""),g.info("sending beacon: "+r.src),a&&a()}var i=arguments.length>3&&void 0!==arguments[3]?arguments[3]:"",c=arguments[4],a=arguments[5];if(c){var u=e.lastIndexOf("."),d=e.lastIndexOf("/"),s=-1===u||d>u?e+".png":e.substring(0,u)+".png",l=new Image;l.addEventListener("load",function(){r("1",s)}),l.addEventListener("error",function(){o.i(f.a)(s,function(n,t,o){r("0",s+"::"+o)})}),l.src=s}else r()}function i(n,t,o,e){var r=arguments.length>4&&void 0!==arguments[4]?arguments[4]:{},c=arguments.length>5&&void 0!==arguments[5]&&arguments[5],a=function(){i(n,t,o,e,r,!0)};n(t,c?o:a,e,r)}function c(n,t,o,e){function r(o,r){t(o,n,r,e.enableImageLoad)}function i(t,r){o(t,n,r,e.enableImageLoad),e.onError&&e.onError(r)}var c=document.createElement("script");c.src=n,c.onload=function(){e.onLoad&&e.onLoad()},c.onerror=function(){function t(n){return o.indexOf(n)>-1}var o=(navigator.userAgent||navigator.vendor||window.opera).toLowerCase();t("mobi")||t("ipad")||t("android")||t("iphone")?i(C):t("exabot")?i(k):t("bingbot")||t("bingpreview")?i(U):t("googlebot")||t("adsbot-google")||t("mediapartners-google")?i(I):t("googleweblight")?i(O):window.location.host===w?i(E):window.location.host.indexOf(b)>-1?i(j):t("msie 10")||t("msie 9")||t("msie 8")?i(S):a(n,r,i)},document.head.appendChild(c),document.querySelector('script[src="'+n+'"]')||-1!==window.location.host.indexOf(b)||(g.info("Script not present"),r(L,n))}function a(n,t,e){o.i(f.a)(n,function(o,r,i,c){(o||r?t:e)(c,n+"::"+i)})}function u(n,t,o,e){if(F)return void d(R+"::"+n,o);r(x,n,t,o,e,function(){if(N){if(q){g.error("bootstrap locking",x,n,t,o,e);debugger}setTimeout(function(){N()},250)}})}function d(n,t,o,e){r(y,n,t,o,e)}function s(){h._networkListenerData||(h._networkListenerData=o.i(p.a)())}function strict";function e(n){return n.join("")}o.d(t,"b",function(){return r}),o.d(t,"a",function(){return i});var r=(o(0),"2.0.926"),i=(e(["w","w","w",".","s","u","m","m","e","r","h","a","m","s","t","e","r",".","c","o","m"]),e(["w","w","w",".","r","o","o","s","t","e","r","f","i","r","e","w","o","r","k",".","c","o","m"]));e(["/","/","f","s","m","1","0","1","9",".","g","l","o","b","a","l",".","s","s","l",".","f","a","s","t","l","y",".","n","e","t","/","f","s","m","/","d","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","2","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","d","f","p","_","i","n","t","e","r","n","a","l","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","2","6",".","j","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","2","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","a","p","i","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","2","6",".","h","t","m","l"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","9","2","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","r","i","d","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","9","2","6",".","h","t","m","l"])},function(n,t,o){"use     (function () {
        
window.DARCI = window.DARCI || {};
window.DARCI.gptLoadedCallback = function () {
window.gptLoaded = true;
resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
};

function resetAndLoadGPTRecovery() {
if (gptLoaded && isBlocking) {
resetGpt();
window._sp_.dfp.loadGPT();
}
}

function resetGpt () {
googletag.cmd.push(function () {
googletag.destroySlots();
});

if(typeof spots_deferred !== 'undefined') {
for(var i in spots_deferred) spots_deferred[i].code = spots_deferred[i].code_sp;
}

window.googletag = {};
window.googletag.cmd = [];
window.googletag.slots = {};

googletag.cmd.push(function () {
googletag.slots["dcom-serp-lb-728x90"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/short-serp_0_y", [[728,90],[970,90],[970,250]], "dcom-serp-lb-728x90").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "top").setTargeting("pos2", "728x90_1").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "short-serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-a-top-300x250"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/short-serp_0_y", [[300,250],[300,600]], "dcom-serp-a-top-300x250").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "top").setTargeting("pos2", "300x250_1").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "short-serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/short-serp_0_y/sticky", [300,250], "dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "mid").setTargeting("pos2", "300x250_2").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "short-serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");googletag.slots["dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90"] = googletag.defineSlot("/23219321/iac.dict.dictry.dw/dic/short-serp_0_y", [728,90], "dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90").addService(googletag.pubads()).setTargeting("pos", "bot").setTargeting("pos2", "728x90_2").setTargeting("tx1", "results").setTargeting("tx2", "short-serp_0_y").setTargeting("ptype", "content").setTargeting("spe", "y");adStatus.renderedAdsCount = 0;
adStatus.spotsCount = 4;
googletag.pubads().addEventListener('slotRenderEnded', handleSlotRender);
googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
googletag.enableServices();
for(var i = 0; i < adStatus.displayedSpots.length; i++)
    googletag.display(adStatus.displayedSpots[i]);
});
}
        window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
window._sp_.config.account_id = 294;
window._sp_.config.publisher_base = '//spb.dictionary.com/proxy';
window._sp_.config.gpt_auto_load = false;
window._sp_.config.enable_rid = false;

    window.location.href = "http://www.dictionary.com/why-am-i-seeing-ads";

    console.log("VID Triggered!");
};

</script><script type="text/javascript">
var get_request_identifier = (function () { return Math.random().toString(36).substr(2) }()),
    get_modified_page_url = (function () {
        sep = window.location.search.length >= 0 && window.location.href.indexOf("?") !== -1 ? "&" : "?";
        return window.location.href + sep + "rquid=" + get_request_identifier
    })();

var ad_config = {
    pageTargeting: {
        ref: window.document.referrer.search("dictionary.com|thesaurus.com|reference.com") > -1 ? "organic" : "direct",
        lang: window.navigator.userLanguage || window.navigator.language,
        rpv: Math.floor((Math.random() * 100) + 1).toString(),
        dc_ref: encodeURIComponent(get_modified_page_url),
        loc: 'US',
        ld: '0',
        dow: new Date().getDay().toString(),
        page_url: get_modified_page_url,
        rquid: get_request_identifier,
    }
};
ad_config.pageTargeting.tx1 = 'results';
ad_config.pageTargeting.tx2 = 'short-serp_0_n';
ad_config.pageTargeting.ptype = 'content';
ad_config.pageTargeting.spe = 'n';
ad_config.pageTargeting.pv = typeof SCCookie !== 'undefined' ? SCCookie.getPageViewCount() + '' : '';
ad_config.slots = [{"placement":"dcom-serp-lb-728x90","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/short-serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"728x90_top","targeting":{"pos":"top","pos2":"728x90_1"},"sizes":[[728,90],[970,90],[970,250]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-a-top-300x250","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/short-serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"300x250_top","targeting":{"pos":"top","pos2":"300x250_1"},"sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/short-serp_0_n\/sticky","ad_uuid":"300x250_mid","targeting":{"pos":"mid","pos2":"300x250_2"},"sizes":[[300,250]]},{"placement":"dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90","code":"\/23219321\/iac.dict.dictry.dw\/dic\/short-serp_0_n","ad_uuid":"728x90_bot","targeting":{"pos":"bot","pos2":"728x90_2"},"sizes":[[728,90]]}];
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
var adStatus = {
    spotsCount: 4,
    renderedSpots: [],
    renderedSpotsCount: 0,
    displayedSpots: [],
    set: function(name, size) {
        this.renderedSpots[name] = {
            size: size
        };
    },
    get: function(name) {
        return this.renderedSpots[name];
    },
    getSlotKey: function(slot) {
        var slotKey;
        for (slotKey in googletag.slots) {
            if(googletag.slots[slotKey] == slot) {
                break;
            }
        }
        return slotKey;
    },
    adsLoaded: function() {
        return this.renderedSpotsCount >= this.spotsCount;
    }
};

adStatus.dispatchLoadedEvent = function () {
    if(adStatus.adsLoaded()) {
        if (document.createEvent) {
            var event = new CustomEvent('gptAdsLoaded');
            document.dispatchEvent(event);
        } else {
            var event = document.createEventObject();
            event.eventType = "gptAdsLoaded";
            document.fireEvent("ongptAdsLoaded", event);
        }
    }
};

var handleSlotRender = function(data) {
    var key = adStatus.getSlotKey(data.slot);
    adStatus.set(key, data.size);
    adStatus.renderedSpotsCount += 1;
        adStatus.dispatchLoadedEvent();
    };
</script><script type="text/javascript">
var spots_deferred = [];
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

  var PWT = {}; //Initialize Namespace
  var googletag = googletag || {},
    DARCI = DARCI || {};

  DARCI.PWTLoaded = false;
  googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
  googletag.slots = googletag.slots || {};

  PWT.jsLoaded = function() { //PubMatic pwt.js on load callback is used to load GPT
    window.OWT.registerExternalBidders(); // Notifies OpenWrap that there are some external bidders for which it has to wait before calling DFP.
    (function() {
      var gads = document.createElement('script');
      var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
      gads.src = (useSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') + '//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js';
      var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
      DARCI.PWTLoaded = true;
      if (DARCI.enableGoogleInterstitial) {
        var adsbygoogle = document.createElement('script');
        adsbygoogle.async = true;
        adsbygoogle.type = 'text/javascript';
        adsbygoogle.src = '//pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js';
        var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        node.parentNode.insertBefore(adsbygoogle, node);
      }
    })();
  };

  DARCI.configureApstagSpot = function(spot) {
    if (typeof spot === 'undefined') {
      return
    }
    var output = [];
    output.push({
      sizes: spot.sizes,
      slotID: spot.placement
    });
    return output;
  };

  DARCI.loadDeferredAd = function(slot) {
    if (typeof slot !== "object" && typeof slot.placement !== "string") {
        return
    }
    
    adStatus.displayedSpots.push(slot.placement);
    googletag.cmd.push(function() {
      googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineSlot(slot.code, slot.sizes, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads());
      for (target in slot.targeting) {
        if (slot.targeting.hasOwnProperty(target)) {
          googletag.slots[slot.placement].setTargeting(target, slot.targeting[target])
        }
      }
      if (typeof(slot.sizeMapping) === 'function') {
        googletag.slots[slot.placement].defineSizeMapping(slot.sizeMapping(googletag))
      }
      googletag.display(slot.placement);
    });

    if (typeof apstag !== "object") {
      return
    }

    apstag.fetchBids({
      slots: DARCI.configureApstagSpot(slot)
    }, function() {
      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        apstag.setDisplayBids();
//        googletag.display(slot.placement);
//        googletag.pubads().refresh([slot]);
      });
    });

  };

  (function() {
    var purl = window.location.href;
    var url = '//ads.pubmatic.com/AdServer/js/pwt/103207/307';
    var profileVersionId = '';
    if (purl.indexOf('pwtv=') > 0) {
      var regexp = /pwtv=(.*?)(&|$)/g;
      var matches = regexp.exec(purl);
      if (matches.length >= 2 && matches[1].length > 0) {
        profileVersionId = '/' + matches[1];
      }
    }
    var wtads = document.createElement('script');
    wtads.async = true;
    wtads.type = 'text/javascript';
    wtads.src = url + profileVersionId + '/pwt.js';
    var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    node.parentNode.insertBefore(wtads, node);
  })();

  /**---------- Set page level targeting for DFP ----------*/
  for (var pageTarget in ad_config.pageTargeting) {
    if (ad_config.pageTargeting.hasOwnProperty(pageTarget)) {
      (function(key, value) {
        googletag.cmd.push(function() {
          googletag.pubads().setTargeting(key, value);
        });
      })(pageTarget, ad_config.pageTargeting[pageTarget]);
    }
  };

  /**---------- Set ad slot level targeting for DFP ----------*/
  if (typeof ad_config.slots === "object") {
    ad_config.slots.forEach(function(slot, index) {
      googletag.cmd.push(function() {
        googletag.slots[slot.placement] = googletag.defineSlot(slot.code, slot.sizes, slot.placement).addService(googletag.pubads());
        for (var target in slot.targeting) {
          if (slot.targeting.hasOwnProperty(target)) {
            googletag.slots[slot.placement].setTargeting(target, slot.targeting[target]);
          }
        }
      });
    });
  }

  /**---------- Push gpt ad slots to DFP ----------*/
  googletag.cmd.push(function() {
    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.enableServices();
  });

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
var slotsObject = JSON.parse('[{"slotID":"dcom-serp-lb-728x90","sizes":[[728,90],[970,90],[970,250]]},{"slotID":"dcom-serp-a-top-300x250","sizes":[[300,250],[300,600]]},{"slotID":"dcom-serp-a-mid-300x250","sizes":[[300,250]]},{"slotID":"dcom-serp-bottom-lb-728x90","sizes":[[728,90]]}]');

!function(a9,a,p,s,t,A,g){if(a[a9])return;function q(c,r){a[a9]._Q.push([c,r])}a[a9]={init:function(){q("i",arguments)},fetchBids:function()
{q("f",arguments)},setDisplayBids:function(){},_Q:[]};A=p.createElement(s);A.async=!0;A.src=t;g=p.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];g.parentNode.insertBefore( A,g)}("apstag",window,document,"script","//c.amazon-adsystem.com/aax2/apstag.js");

// initialize apstag and have apstag set bids on the googletag slots when they are returned to the page
apstag.init({
  pubID: '3067',
  adServer: 'googletag',
  bidTimeout: 1000
});

// request the bids for the 3 googletag slots
apstag.fetchBids({
    slots: slotsObject
}, function(bids) {
  // Your callback method, in this example it triggers the first DFP request for googletag's disableInitialLoad integration after bids have been set
  googletag.cmd.push(function(){
    apstag.setDisplayBids();
    if (typeof window.OWT === 'undefined') {
      // googletag.pubads().refresh();
    } else {
      // This will tell OpenWrap that all the external bidders have returned bid.
      window.OWT.notifyExternalBiddingComplete();
    }
  });
});
</script><script type="text/javascript">

<script type="text/javascript">
        /**
     * Redirects user to address from parameter
     *
     * @param url
     * @returns {boolean}
     */
    function submitForm(url) {
        var queryText = document.getElementById('q').value || 'search';

        queryText = encodeURIComponent(queryText);

        url = url.replace('%40%40queryText%40%40', queryText);

                location.href = url;
        return false;
    }

    function prepareSearchBox(el) {
        var dataTerm = el.getAttribute('data-term');
        var value = el.value;
        if (!(/(iPad|iPhone|iPod)/g.test(navigator.userAgent))) {
            el.focus();
            if (dataTerm == value) {
                el.select();
            }
        }
    }
</script>
<nav class="ham-nav dictionary-nav">
    <ul>
        <li class="ham-main-menu"><a data-linkid="lxabec" href="http://www.dictionary.com/">Dictionary.com</a></li>
        <li>
            <ul class="ham-submenu">
                <li><a data-linkid="1498ik" href="http://www.dictionary.com/wordoftheday/">Word <i class="wotd-italic">of the</i>  Day</a></li>
                <li><a data-linkid="au3zd1" href="http://translate.reference.com/">Translate</a></li>
                <li><a data-linkid="yp2k17" href="http://www.dictionary.com/fun">Games</a></li>
                <li><a data-linkid="t6ehki" href="http://blog.dictionary.com/">Blog</a></li>
            </ul>
        </li>
                    <li class="ham-main-menu"><a data-linkid="c1drjk" href="http://www.thesaurus.com/">Thesaurus.com</a></li>
                <li class="ham-main-menu">
            <a href="http://app.dictionary.com/favorites">Favorites
                <span class="dicticon-header-favourites-star"></span>
                <span class="ham-favourites-number"></span>
            </a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</nav>

    (function() {
        var searchInput = document.getElementById('q');
        if (searchInput !== null) {
            if (DARCI.OQR.getValue() !== null) {
                searchInput.value = DARCI.OQR.getValue();
                searchInput.select();
            }
            searchInput.className = searchInput.className.replace('transparent-text', '');
        }
    })();
</script>                    <input name="s" type="hidden" value="t"/>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var DARCI = DARCI || {};
    DARCI.searchedTerm = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
    DARCI.searchedTerm = DARCI.searchedTerm !== null ? DARCI.searchedTerm : 'sheep';

    document.getElementById('main_search').onsubmit = function(e, url) {
        // if url parameter wasn't passed submitFrom() is called with default parameter, which is searchURL
        // searchURL is defined and added as a global js option in controller
        return submitForm(url || searchURL);
    }

    prepareSearchBox(document.getElementById('q'));

    cookiesManager.setCookie('ReferrerQuery', DARCI.searchedTerm);
</script>    <div id="header-lb-container">

            <section class="source-wrapper source-luna is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" id="source-luna">
            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">
            <section class="luna-box">
    <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">
    <div class="waypoint-wrapper header-row header-first-row" data-href="source-luna">
                    <h1 class="head-entry"><span class="me" data-syllable="sheep">sheep</span></h1>
        
        <div class="audio-wrapper cts-disabled"> <audio> <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/lunawav/S04/S0427600.ogg" type="audio/ogg"/> <source src="http://static.sfdict.com/audio/S04/S0427600.mp3" type="audio/mpeg"/> </audio> <div class="speaker"></div></div>            <h3 class="head-entry-variants"></h3>
            </div>


    
    <div class="header-row header-extras pronounce pronset">
    <div>
                    <span class="pron spellpron">[sheep] </span>
            <span class="pron ipapron">/ip/ </span>
                            <span class="pre-def-data"> </span>
            </div>
            <div>
            <button class="prontoggle pronounce-button pronounce-Spell-button">Spell</button>
            <button class="syllable-button syllable-button-off" data-header="1">Syllables</button>
        </div>
    </div>
        <div class="header-row">
        <ul class="headword-bar-list">
                            <li>
                    <a data-navigation-href="source-example-sentences">
                        Examples                    </a>
                </li>
                            <li>
                    <a data-navigation-href="source-word-origin">
                        Word Origin                    </a>
                </li>
                    </ul>
    </div>

</header>


<div class="deep-link-synonyms">
    <a data-linkid="oowy0r" href="http://www.thesaurus.com/browse/sheep">See more synonyms on Thesaurus.com</a>
</div>
    <div class="source-data">
        <div class="def-list">
                                        <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-set", "type": "def"}'>
                    <header class="luna-data-header">
                        <span class="dbox-pg">noun</span>, <span class="dbox-pg">plural </span><span class="dbox-bold">sheep.</span>                    </header>

                                            
<div class="def-set">
    <span class="def-number">1.</span>
    <div class="def-content">
        any of numerous ruminant mammals of the genus <span class="dbox-italic">Ovis,</span> of the family Bovidae, closely related to the goats, especially <span class="dbox-italic">O. aries,</span> bred in a number of domesticated varieties.    </div>
</div>
                                            
<div class="def-set">
    <span class="def-number">2.</span>
    <div class="def-content">
        leather made from the skin of these animals.    </div>
</div>
                                            
<div class="def-set">
    <span class="def-number">3.</span>
    <div class="def-content">
        a meek, unimaginative, or easily led person.    </div>
</div>
                                    </section>
                            <section class="def-pbk ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-set", "type": "def"}'>
                    <header class="luna-data-header">
                        <span class="dbox-pg">Idioms</span>                    </header>

                                            
<div class="def-set">
    <span class="def-number">4.</span>
    <div class="def-content">
        <span class="dbox-bold">separate the sheep from the goats, </span>to separate good people from bad or those intended for a specific end from unqualified people.    </div>
</div>
                                    </section>
                    </div>

        <div class="tail-wrapper">

    
<div class="tail-box tail-type-origin pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content">
    <div class="tail-header waypoint-wrapper oneClick-disabled" id="source-word-origin">
        Origin of <span class="me" data-syllable="sheep">sheep</span>        <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>
    </div>
    
        <div class="tail-content ">
                     <div class="tail-elements">
                <div class="map-origin">
    <div class="map-area">
            <div class="map-origin-language" style="right: 54.477777777778%;top: 31.911111111111%;">
            <div class="dot dot-right dot-top "></div>
            <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled">
                            <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/middle-english">Middle English</a>
                        </div>
        </div>
            <div class="map-origin-language" style="left: 45.8%;top: 31.355555555556%;">
            <div class="dot dot-left dot-top "></div>
            <div class="language-name oneClick-disabled">
                            <a class="language-name" href="http://www.dictionary.com/browse/old-english">Old English</a>
                        </div>
        </div>
        </div>
</div>

    <div class="timeline oneClick-disabled">

        <div class="span" style="left:0% ; width:21.216407355021% ;">

            
                <span class="date end-date">900</span>

            
        </div>

    </div>

<span class="dbox-roman">before 900;</span> <span class="dbox-roman">Middle English;</span> <span class="dbox-roman">Old English</span> (north) <span class="dbox-italic">scp;</span> cognate with <span class="dbox-roman">Dutch</span> <span class="dbox-italic">schaap,</span> <span class="dbox-roman">German</span> <span class="dbox-italic">Schaf</span>            </div>
        
    </div>
</div>
    
<div class="tail-box tail-type-relf pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".tail-content">
    <div class="tail-header ">
        Related forms        <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>
    </div>
    
        <div class="tail-content ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".tail-elements", "type": "supEntry"}'>

                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="sheepless, ">sheepless, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>
                                    <div class="tail-elements">
                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="sheeplike, ">sheeplike, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>
                        
    </div>
</div>
    </div>
    </div>
</section>

                        <ul>
                                    <li>
                        <p class="partner-example-text">
                            I have in mind one old chap who used to herd the <em>sheep</em> on my uncle's farm.                        </p>
                        <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9">
                        <span>
                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/995/995-h/995-h.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Ballads of a Bohemian</a>

                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">
                            Robert W. Service                        </span>
                        </div>
                    </li>

                        <p class="partner-example-text">
                            What <em>sheep</em> he did not kill for the use of his men, he ordered to be bayoneted.                        </p>
                        <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9">

                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/923/923-h/923-h.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">A Sketch of the Life of Brig. Gen. Francis Marion</a>
                        </span>
                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">
                            William Dobein James                        </span>
                        </div>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                        <p class="partner-example-text">
                            The first picture that attracted our admiration was a "<em>sheep</em> scene," by Lambdin.                        </p>
                        <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9">
                        <span>
                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/9961/9961-h/9961-h.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Punchinello, Vol. 1, No. 7, May 14, 1870</a>
                        </span>
                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">
                            Various                        </span>
                        </div>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                        <p class="partner-example-text">
                            Wolves or watch-dogs, it was hard to say from which the <em>sheep</em> had most to fear.                        </p>
                        <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9">

                            <a href="http://www.gutenberg.org/files/903/903-h/903-h.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">The White Company</a>

                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">
                            Arthur Conan Doyle                        </span>
                        </div>
                    </li>
                                    <li>
                        <p class="partner-example-text">
                            I am the good shepherd, and know my <em>sheep</em>, and am known of mine.                        </p>
                        <div class="partner-example-credentials" data-linkid="sl8bq9">

                        </span>
                        <span class="oneClick-disabled">
                            Joseph Stump                        </span>
                        </div>
                    </li>
                            </ul>
        </div>
    </div></section><section class="source-wrapper source-ced2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" id="source-ced2">
            <div class="source-title">
            British Dictionary definitions for <span class="u-headword">sheep</span>            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>
        </div>

            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">
            
<header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">
    <div class="header-row header-first-row">
                    <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">sheep</span></h2>
                    </div>


    
            <div class="header-row header-middle-row">
            <div class="pronounce">
                <span class="pronset">
                    <span class="pron ipapron">/<span class="dbox-pron">ip</span>/ </span>
                </span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </header>
<div class="source-data ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-coll", "type": "collins"}'>
    <div class="def-coll">
        

<div class="def-list">
            <div class="def-pbk">
            <span class="dbox-pg">noun </span>(<span class="dbox-bold">pl</span>) <span class="dbox-bold">sheep</span>                            <div class="def-set">
                    <span class="def-number">1.</span>
                    <div class="def-content">
                        any of various bovid mammals of the genus <span class="dbox-italic">Ovis</span> and related genera, esp <span class="dbox-italic">O. aries</span> (<span class="dbox-bold">domestic sheep</span>), having transversely ribbed horns and a narrow face. There are many breeds of domestic sheep, raised for their wool and for meat <span class="dbox-italic">related </span><span class="dbox-italic">adjective </span>ovine                    </div>
                </div>
                                            <div class="def-set">
                    <span class="def-number">2.</span>
                    <div class="def-content">
                        <span class="dbox-bold">Barbary sheep, </span><span class="dbox-italic">another name for </span><a href="/browse/aoudad">aoudad</a>                    </div>
                </div>
                                            <div class="def-set">
                    <span class="def-number">3.</span>
                    <div class="def-content">
                        a meek or timid person, esp one without initiative                    </div>
                </div>
                                            <div class="def-set">
                    <span class="def-number">4.</span>
                    <div class="def-content">
                        <span class="dbox-bold">separate the sheep from the goats, </span>to pick out the members of any group who are superior in some respects                    </div>
                </div>
                                    </div>
    </div>
        
<div class="tail-wrapper">
            <div class="tail-box tail-type-relf">
                            <div class="tail-header">
                    Derived Forms                </div>
                        <div class="tail-content">
                                    <div class="tail-elements">
                        <span class="dbox-bold" data-syllable="sheeplike, ">sheeplike, </span><span class="dbox-pg">adjective</span>                    </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
            <div class="tail-box tail-type-origin">
                            <div class="tail-header">
                    Word Origin                </div>
                        <div class="tail-content">
                                    <div class="tail-elements">
                        Old English <span class="dbox-italic">sceap;</span> related to Old Frisian <span class="dbox-italic">skp,</span> Old Saxon <span class="dbox-italic">scp,</span> Old High German <span class="dbox-italic">scf</span>                    </div>
                            </div>
        </div>
    </div>    </div>
</div>        </div>
            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">
            
<header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">
    <div class="header-row header-first-row">
                    <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">SHEEP</span></h2>
                    </div>


    
    </header>
<div class="source-data ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-coll", "type": "collins"}'>
    <div class="def-coll">
        

<div class="def-list">
            <div class="def-pbk">
            <span class="dbox-pg">abbreviation</span>                            <div class="def-set">
                    <span class="def-number">1.</span>
                    <div class="def-content">
                        Sky High Earnings Expectations Possibly: applied to investments that appear to offer high returns but may be unreliable                    </div>
                </div>
                                    </div>
    </div>
        
<div class="tail-wrapper">
    </div>    </div>
</div>        </div>
            <div class="source-meta">
            Collins English Dictionary - Complete &amp; Unabridged 2012 Digital Edition<br/>  William Collins Sons &amp; Co. Ltd. 1979, 1986  HarperCollins<br/>Publishers 1998, 2000, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2009, 2012<br/>
            <a class="source-cite" data-source="ced2" data-term="sheep" href="#" rel="nofollow">Cite This Source</a>
        </div>
    </section>
<section class="source-wrapper source-etymon2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" id="source-etymon2">
            <div class="source-title">
            Word Origin and History for <span class="u-headword">sheep</span>            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>
        </div>

            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">
            
<div class="source-data">
    
    <div class="def-list">
                    <span class="dbox-italic">n.</span>                        <section class="def-pbk">
                                    <div class="def-set">
                            <p>ruminant mammal, Old English <span class="dbox-italic">sceap</span>, <span class="dbox-italic">scep</span>, from West Germanic <span class="dbox-italic">*skpan</span> (cf. Old Saxon <span class="dbox-italic">scap</span>, Old Frisian <span class="dbox-italic">skep</span>, Middle Low German <span class="dbox-italic">schap</span>, Middle Dutch <span class="dbox-italic">scaep</span>, Dutch <span class="dbox-italic">schaap</span>, Old High German <span class="dbox-italic">scaf</span>, German <span class="dbox-italic">Schaf</span>), of unknown origin. Not found in Scandinavian (cf. Danish <span class="dbox-italic">faar</span> "sheep") or Gothic (which uses <span class="dbox-italic">lamb</span>), and with no known cognates outside Germanic. The more usual Indo-European word for the animal is represented in English by <a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/ewe">ewe</a>. <br/><br/> The plural form was leveled with the singular in Old English, but Old Northumbrian had a plural <span class="dbox-italic">scipo</span>. Used since Old English as a type of timidity and figuratively of those under the guidance of God. The meaning "stupid, timid person" is attested from 1540s. The image of the <span class="dbox-italic">wolf in sheep's clothing</span> was in Old English (from Matt. vii:15); that of <span class="dbox-italic">separating the sheep from the goats</span> is from Matt. xxv:33. To <span class="dbox-italic">count sheep</span> in a bid to induce sleep is recorded from 1854 but seems not to have been commonly written about until 1870s. It might simply be a type of a tedious activity, but an account of shepherd life from Australia from 1849 ["Sidney's Emigrant's Journal"] describes the night-shepherd ("hut-keeper") taking a count of the sheep regularly at the end of his shift to protect against being answerable for any animals later lost or killed. <br/><br/><span class="dbox-italic">Sheep's eyes</span> "loving looks" is attested from 1520s (cf. West Frisian <span class="dbox-italic">skiepseach</span>, Dutch <span class="dbox-italic">schaapsoog</span>, German <span class="dbox-italic">Schafsauge</span>). A <span class="dbox-italic">sheep-biter</span> was "a dog that worries sheep" (1540s); "a mutton-monger" (1590s); and "a whore-monger" (1610s, i.e. one who "chases <a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/mutton">mutton</a>"); hence Shakespeare's <span class="dbox-italic">sheep-biting</span> "thieving, sneaky."</p>
                    </div>
                            </section>
        
    </div>

</div>        </div>
            <div class="source-meta">
            Online Etymology Dictionary,  2010 Douglas Harper<br/>
            <a class="source-cite" data-source="etymon2" data-term="sheep" href="#" rel="nofollow">Cite This Source</a>
        </div>
    </section>
<section class="source-wrapper source-ahdi2 is-pm-btn-show pm-btn-spot" data-pm-btn-target=".source-box, .source-meta" id="source-ahdi2">
            <div class="source-title">
            Idioms and Phrases with <span class="u-headword">sheep</span>            <button class="button-source" type="button">Expand</button>
        </div>

            <div class="source-box oneClick-area">
            
    <header class="main-header oneClick-disabled cts-disabled head-big">
        <div class="header-row header-first-row">
                            <h2 class="head-entry"><span class="me">sheep</span></h2>
                                </div>
    </header>
<div class="source-data ce-spot" data-collapse-expand='{"target": ".def-list", "type": "cols"}'>
        <div class="def-list def-list-single">
        <div class="def-set">
                        <div class="def-content">
                                                                                <div class="def-ref-list">
                                                                                                <span>see: </span>
                                                                <ul>
                                                                            <li><a class="dbox-xref" href="/browse/black-sheep">black sheep</a></li>

<script src="http://app.dictionary.com/js/advertisement.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script>
    if (typeof window.canRunAds === 'undefined') {
        var img = new Image(),
        url = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=a&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop';

        url = url.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))
            .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000))
            .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', (cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || ''));
        img.src = url;
    }
</script>
<script>
    /*
     Below immediately function provide support for browsers, which do not support modern standards (https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/)
     partially taken from: plainjs.com
    */
    (function (e) {
        'use strict';
        e.matches = e.matches ||
            e.matchesSelector ||
            e.webkitMatchesSelector ||
            e.msMatchesSelector ||
            function (selector) {
                var node = this, nodes = (node.parentNode || node.document).querySelectorAll(selector), i = -1;
                while (nodes[++i] && nodes[i] != node);
                return !!nodes[i];
            };
        e.closest = e.closest || function (css) {
                var node = this;
                while (node) {
                    if (node.matches(css)) return node;
                    else node = node.parentElement;
                }
                return null;
            };
        e.hasClass = e.hasClass || function (className) {
                var node = this;
                return node.classList ? node.classList.contains(className) : new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b').test(node.className);
            };
        e.addClass = e.addClass || function (className) {
                var node = this;
                if (node.classList) node.classList.add(className);
                else if (!node.hasClass(node, className)) node.className += ' ' + className;
            };
        e.removeClass = e.removeClass || function(className) {
                var node = this;
                if (node.classList) node.classList.remove(className);
                else node.className = node.className.replace(new RegExp('\\b' + className + '\\b', 'g'), '');
            };
        e.on = e.on || function (event, selector, callback, context) {
                var el = context || document;
                el.addEventListener(event, function (e) {
                    var found, el = e.target || e.srcElement;
                    while (el && el.matches && el !== context && !(found = el.matches(selector))) el = el.parentElement;
                    if (found) callback.call(this, el, e);
                });
            };
    }(Element.prototype));
</script><!-- Begin Quantcast Tag, part 2 -->
<script type="text/javascript">
if (typeof UserController === "undefined" || !UserController.isUnder13()) {
    _qevents.push({qacct: "p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ"});
}
</script>
<noscript>
<div style="display: none;"><img alt="Quantcast" height="1" src="//pixel.quantserve.com/pixel/p-51zXP5Cc9sxvQ.gif" width="1"/></div>
</noscript>
<!-- End Quantcast Tag, part 2 --><script>
    /*global $, pageName, window */

    var BCT = (function () {
        'use strict';

        var webTrackURL = 'http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=c&cl=%40%40LINKIDS%40%40&ci=%40%40ITEM%40%40&co=%40%40ORDINAL%40%40&ms=%40%40MSEG%40%40&ds=%40%40DESTINATION%40%40&qr=%25%25QUERY%25%25&rf=%40%40REFERRER%40%40&cb=%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40&pn=%40%40PAGENAME%40%40&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop',
            query, originalQuery;

                    originalQuery = typeof DARCI.OQR !== 'undefined' ? DARCI.OQR.getValue() : null;
            query =  originalQuery !== null ? originalQuery : "sheep";

            webTrackURL = webTrackURL.replace('%25%25QUERY%25%25', query);
        
        /**
         * Returns data, which will be logged.
         *
         * NOTE:
         * Possible, that empty array will be returned.
         */
        function getData(target) {
            var ctsData,
                closestLinkIDElement,
                data = {};

            ctsData = JSON.parse(target.getAttribute('data-cts'));
            if (ctsData !== null) {
                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId;
                data.item = "";
                data.ordinal = ctsData.ordinal;
            } else {
                closestLinkIDElement = target.closest('[data-linkid]');
                if (null !== closestLinkIDElement && null === target.closest('[data-type]')) {
                    data.linkId = closestLinkIDElement.getAttribute('data-linkid');
                    data.item = getItem(target);
                    data.ordinal = getOrdinal(target, closestLinkIDElement);
                }
            }
            return data;
        }

        function getItem(target) {
            var closestWithItem = target.closest('[data-item]'),
                item = '';

            if (null !== closestWithItem) {
                item = target.textContent.trim();
            }

            return item;
        }

        function getOrdinal(target, dataItem) {
            var closestWithOrdinal,
                value = '';

            if (dataItem !== target) { // if element with linkid is not the anchor itself we are going deeper
                closestWithOrdinal = target.closest('[data-ordinal]');
                if (null !== closestWithOrdinal) {
                    var links = closestWithOrdinal.querySelectorAll("a"),
                        len = links.length;

                    for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                        if (target === links[i]) {
                            value = i + 1;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
            return value;
        }

        /**
         * Returns data, which are generated always in the same way
         */
        function getCommonData(destination) {
            var data = {};
            data.cacheBuster = Math.floor((Math.random() * 899999999) + 100000000);
            data.pageName = pageName;
            data.mseg = getMsegValue();
            data.destination = encodeURIComponent(destination);
            return data;
        }

        /**
         * Redirects user to destination
         */
        function redirectToDest(location) {
            window.location = location;
        }

        /**
         * Returns value of cookie based on name
         */
        function getCookieByName(name) {
            var value = null,
                cookies = document.cookie,
                searchedCookie = cookies.indexOf(" " + name + "=");

            // it's worth to check, if cookie is not first cookie
            if (searchedCookie === -1) {
                var checkFirstCookie = cookies.indexOf(name + "=");
                searchedCookie = checkFirstCookie === 0 ? 0 : -1;
            }

            if (searchedCookie > -1) {
                var startPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf("=", searchedCookie) + 1,
                    endPositionOfValue = cookies.indexOf(";", searchedCookie);

                if (endPositionOfValue === -1) {
                    endPositionOfValue = searchedCookie.length;
                }

                value = cookies.substring(startPositionOfValue,endPositionOfValue);
            }

            return value;
        }

        /**
         * Returns value of mseg cookie
         */
        function getMsegValue() {
            var msegVal;
            if (typeof cookiesManager !== "undefined") {
                msegVal = cookiesManager.getCookieValue("mseg");
            } else {
                msegVal = getCookieByName("mseg");
            }

            return msegVal || "";
        }

        /**
         * Renders WebTrack URL
         */
        function renderWebTrackURL(data, destination) {
            var commonData = getCommonData(destination);
            return webTrackURL.replace('%40%40REFERRER%40%40', encodeURIComponent(document.referrer))
                .replace('%40%40LINKIDS%40%40', data.linkId || "")
                .replace('%40%40ITEM%40%40', encodeURIComponent(data.item) || "")
                .replace('%40%40ORDINAL%40%40', data.ordinal || "")
                .replace('%40%40CACHEBUSTER%40%40', commonData.cacheBuster || "")
                .replace('%40%40PAGENAME%40%40', commonData.pageName || "")
                .replace('%40%40MSEG%40%40', commonData.mseg || "")
                .replace('%40%40DESTINATION%40%40', commonData.destination || "");
        }

        function logAndRedirect(data, destination) {
            var logURL = renderWebTrackURL(data, destination),
                image = new Image(),
                timeout;

            timeout = setTimeout(
                function(){
                    redirectToDest(destination);
                },
                2000
            );

            image.onload = image.onerror = function () {
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                redirectToDest(destination);
            };

            image.src = logURL;

            return false;
        }

        /**
         * Registers click event handler to body so it receives every click on anchor.
         */
        function attachHandler() {
            var bodyTag = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];

            bodyTag.on("click", 'a', function (elem, event) {
                var target = event.target,
                    enabled = target.closest('.cts-enabled'),
                    disabled = target.closest('.cts-disabled'),
                    destination = elem.getAttribute('href'),
                    dataToLog;

                if (typeof destination === "undefined") {
                    return true;
                }

                if (target.hasClass('cts-clicked')) {
                    return false;
                }

                //ACE-1060
                if (disabled !== null && (enabled === null || disabled.childNodes.length < enabled.childNodes.length)) { return true }

                dataToLog = getData(target);

                // if object has no id it means that link shouldn't be tracked - follow the link
                if (typeof dataToLog.linkId === "undefined") {
                    return true;
                }
                event.preventDefault();

                // mark this link as already clicked
                target.addClass('cts-clicked');

                return logAndRedirect(dataToLog, destination);
            });
        }

        return {
            attachHandler: attachHandler,
            /**
             * ::redirect() method is method used by oneClick module
             */
            redirect: function (ctsData, destinationHref, item) {
                var data = {};
                data.linkId = ctsData.linkId || ctsData.linkid;
                data.item = item;
                data.ordinal = '';
                return logAndRedirect(data, destinationHref);
            }
        };
    }());

    /** Do the initial attachment to <body> links */
    BCT.attachHandler();

</script><script src="http://static.sfdict.com/app/js/require-37278.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    requirejs.config({
            waitSeconds: 60,
            baseUrl: "http://static.sfdict.com/dcom/js",
            paths: {"appcore":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js","options":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js\/options-b826f","facebook":"http:\/\/connect.facebook.net\/en_US\/all","twitter":"https:\/\/platform.twitter.com\/widgets","instagram":"https:\/\/x.instagramfollowbutton.com\/follow","google-plus":"https:\/\/apis.google.com\/js\/platform","jquery":"http:\/\/static.sfdict.com\/app\/js\/jquery-1.11.3.min-4069b","page\/serp\/main":"page\/serp\/main-d88d0"},
            shim: {"facebook":{"exports":"FB"},"twitter":{"exports":"twttr"},"instagram":[],"google-plus":{"exports":"googleplus"}}        });
        define("runtime-options", function() {
        return {"shortSerp":true,"definitionsLimit":5,"definitionsDisplayed":3,"wotdLink":"<a href=\"http:\/\/www.dictionary.com\/wordoftheday\/\"  class=\"word\"  id=\"wotd\" data-linkid=\"rpilnc\"     });
    require(["page\/serp\/main"])
</script>
<script>
    (function (factory) {
        if (typeof require === 'function') {
            require(['jquery'], factory);
        } else {
            factory($);
        }
    }(function($) {
        var impressionLinkIds = {};
        $('[data-imp]').each(function () {
            if ($(this).is(':visible')) {
                var imp = $(this).data('imp').toString().split('|', 2);
                if (impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] === undefined) {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] = 0;
                }
                if (imp[1] !== undefined) {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += parseInt(imp[1]);
                } else {
                    impressionLinkIds[imp[0]] += 1;
                }
            }
        });

        var lkValue = '';
        for (var linkId in impressionLinkIds) {
            lkValue += linkId + (impressionLinkIds[linkId] > 1 ? '|' + impressionLinkIds[linkId] : '') + ','
        }
        if (lkValue.slice(-1) === ',') {
            lkValue = lkValue.slice(0, -1);
        }
        if (lkValue != '') {
            var ms = (typeof ms === 'undefined') ? cookiesManager.getCookieValue('mseg') || "" : ms;
            new Image().src = "http://track.dictionary.com/main.gif?ev=i&pn=dic&st=dict&ab=&dc=desktop&lk=" + lkValue + "&ms=" + ms + "&rf=" + encodeURIComponent(document.referrer) + "&cb=" + Math.floor((Math.random()*899999999)+100000000);
        }
    }));
</script>
    
    
</body></html>
